items.content_html: A versatile and lightweight utility to format file sizes, providing both human-readable and customizable representations. This library supports various size units, including bits, bytes, kilobytes (KB), kibibytes (KiB), megabytes (MB), mebibytes (MiB), and beyond. Users can choose between binary and decimal units for flexibility.
items.title: ishan-18/get-file-size: A versatile and lightweight utility to format file sizes, providing both human-readable and customizable representations. This library supports various size units, including bits, bytes, kilobytes (KB), kibibytes (KiB), megabytes (MB), mebibytes (MiB), and beyond. Users can choose between binary and decimal units for flexibility.

items.content_html: The Payment Recorder is a simple and efficient tool designed to streamline your payment tracking process. Whether you're managing personal expenses, tracking client payments, or monitoring project budgets, this lightweight note pad offers a hassle-free solution.With an intuitive interface, you can easily record and organize payment details.
